duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and deliver face-to-face sales presentations of Comcast products and services to potential customers.
Generate new leads and build customer relationships through prospecting activities and customer referrals.
Stay informed about competitive landscape and emerging technologies to position Comcast Business Services effectively in the marketplace.
Prepare sales and activity reports, and participate in out-of-the-office meetings with customers regularly.
Retain customer base by delivering superior customer experience and ensuring operational efficiencies meet and exceed customer expectations.
Consistently exercise independent judgment and discretion in matters of significance.
